I recently had a great conversation with Scherrie L. Prince on her Play Big Faster podcast. We discussed some of the most important things that business owners and entrepreneurs need to know about properly valuing their company and being exit-ready. We also talked about the NEW ROI: Return on Individuals, and how people can impact business value. I'd love for you to check it out and let us know your thoughts. The link to listen is in the comments below. #Valuation #businessowners #privatecompanies #CEO #CFO #HRTribe #HRCommunity

Last week, I mentioned how some business owners get caught up with day-to-day tasks, and then I listened to this Harvard Business Review podcast episode, "How One Founder Adapted His Role to Scale His Company." The conversation in this episode discussed how Fabricio Bloisi's CEO role evolved as his garage start-up grew into a global tech company. Just as his company expanded, so did his leadership style. He realized that to truly scale, he needed to transition away from day-to-day operations, and he did so by forming an amazing executive team to manage those details. The key takeaway? Growth demands growth. How are you embracing the evolution of your business? How are you preparing to evolve your role to achieve the bigger picture? Let me know in the comments below!
